content: Steven: don’t give up! Never give up! You’re absolutely right: it’s about doing and not doing it perfectly. Write about what strikes passion into your heart. Some articles fly and others don’t. The pieces I’m most proud of got the least amount of attention. Welcome to the unpredictable, sometimes crazy-making roller coaster that is publishing on Medium! Let’s both try and make it about joy and passion first, okay? Thanks. I feel less alone now :)
